description:
This critically-acclaimed interactive training program from Adobe Press combines exceptional quality high-definition video and a printed reference to teach the fundamentals of Adobe Photoshop CC.

Including more than 13 hours of video tutorials, the course comes complete with lesson files, assessment quizzes, and review materials. Experienced instructor Kelly McCathran presents a comprehensive introduction to Photoshop, including best practices as well as fundamental photography and image editing concepts. Beginning with an overview of the Photoshop interface, Kelly goes on to cover Photoshopâ€™s powerful tools including features new to CC such as non-destructive editing using Adobe Camera Raw 8 within Photoshop, the new Smart Sharpen tool, rounded rectangle options, how to work in the Creative Cloud, and more.

Table of Contents

  1. Introducing Photoshop CC
  2. Photoshop Projects
  3. Customizing Photoshop
  4. Image Editing Concepts
  5. Layers and Masks
  6. Image Adjustments & Retouching
  7. Improving Images with Adobe Camera Raw
  8. Working with Type and Creating Mock-Ups
  9. Video Editing, 3D and Special Effects
  10. Outputting Your Images
title: Adobe Photoshop CC Learn by Video
